description:
Having failed to take the igniter by force, Kagakagari takes Rakurowa High School`s sophomores hostage. Still unsure of the igniter`s purpose, Tomoharu slips out to make a deal with Kagakagari while Toru and Rikka quarrel, followed secretly by Kanade. Can they stop the Asura Cryin` out to destroy the alleged “second world?”
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Stigma of the Cursed Sinner
